comment: The structure of all odd integers together with the addition of complex numbers is not a magma. Remark: the structure of the complementary subset of the set of integers, the even integers, is a magma, actually an abelian group, see ~ 2zrngaabl , and even a non-unital ring, see ~ 2zrng . (Contributed by AV, 3-Feb-2020.)
